languages.text: {n}Вы {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}ощущаете{/d} странное беспокойство вокруг старика. Такое же, как и вокруг Кибеллы, но... сильнее. Он не псайкер, либо же наоборот столь могущественен, чтобы скрыть это. Но он определенно обладает потенциалом психической силы выше, чем у обычного смертного. Такие люди встречаются в Империуме — не замеченные искателями Инквизиции, они проживают всю жизнь, пользуясь репутацией людей, с которыми иногда происходят "странные вещи". Возможно, этот дряхлый старец действительно способен увидеть в Таро Императора что-то кроме нарисованных картинок.{/n}

{n}You {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}sense{/d} a strange disturbance around the Vizsier. It is similar to the one that appears around Kibellah, but... stronger. He is not a psyker, or else, he is such a powerful one that he can conceal his gift. However, his psychic potential is definitely higher than that of an average mortal. There are people like that in the Imperium — undiscovered by Inquisitorial hunters, they live out their lives as individuals with a reputation for having "strange things" happen to them on occasion. Perhaps this decrepit old man is indeed capable of gleaning something more from the Emperor's Tarot than just painted pictures.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}ощущаете{/d} странное беспокойство вокруг старика. Такое же, как и вокруг Кибеллы, но... сильнее. Он не псайкер, либо же наоборот столь могущественен, чтобы скрыть это. Но он определенно обладает потенциалом психической силы выше, чем у обычного смертного. Возможно, этот дряхлый старец действительно способен увидеть в Таро Императора что-то кроме нарисованных картинок.{/n}

He is not a psyker, unless he is such a powerful one that he can conceal his gift. However, his psychic potential is definitely higher than that of an average mortal. There are people like that in the Imperium — undiscovered by Inquisitorial hunters, they live out their lives as individuals with a reputation for having "strange things" happen to them on occasion. Perhaps this decrepit old man is indeed capable of gleaning something more from the Emperor's Tarot than just painted pictures.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}spürst{/d} eine seltsame Störung, die den Vizsier umgibt. Sie ähnelt der Aura von Kibellah, ist aber ... stärker. Er ist kein Psioniker ... oder er ist so mächtig, dass er seine Gabe verbergen kann. Allerdings ist sein psionisches Potenzial definitiv höher als das eines durchschnittlichen Sterblichen. Es gibt im Imperium solche Leute ... unentdeckt von den Bluthunden der Inquisition leben sie ihr Leben in dem Ruf, dass ihnen mitunter "seltsame Dinge" zustoßen. Vielleicht ist dieser altersschwache Mann ja tatsächlich in der Lage, im Tarot des Imperators mehr zu sehen, als bunte Bilder.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}sense{/d} a strange disturbance around the Vizsier. It is similar to the one that appears around Kibellah, but... stronger. languages.text: {n}Vous {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}sentez{/d} une étrange perturbation près du vizir, similaire à celle qui entoure généralement Kibellah, mais... plus forte. Ce n'est pas un psyker. Ou alors, un psyker d'une puissance telle qu'il est capable de masquer son don. Son potentiel psychique dépasse de loin celui des simples mortels. Il arrive que, dans l'Imperium, certains individus ne soient pas repérés par les chasseurs de l'Inquisition et vivent leur vie tout à fait normalement, bien qu'ils aient souvent la réputation d'être victimes « d'événements étranges ». Il n'est pas impossible que ce vieil homme décrépit soit capable de voir autre chose que de simples illustrations colorées dans le Tarot de l'Empereur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}sense{/d} a strange disturbance around the Vizsier. It is similar to the one that appears around Kibellah, but... stronger. Ou alors, un psyker d'une puissance telle qu'il est capable de masquer son don. Son potentiel psychique dépasse de loin celui des simples mortels. Il arrive que, dans l'Imperium, certains individus ne soient pas repérés par les chasseurs de l'Inquisition et vivent leur vie tout à fait normalement, bien qu'ils aient souvent la réputation d'être victimes « d'événements étranges ». languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}Sientes{/d} una perturbación en torno al Visir. Es similar a la que rodea a Kibellah, pero... más fuerte. No es psíquico, o, si lo es, es tan poderoso como para ocultar su don. Sin embargo, su potencial psíquico supera al de un mortal medio. Hay gente así en el Imperium. La Inquisición no descubre a todos, y algunos viven con la reputación de vivir «cosas raras» en ocasiones. Tal vez este viejo decrépito sea capaz de ver algo más que simples dibujos en el Tarot del Emperador.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}sense{/d} a strange disturbance around the Vizsier. It is similar to the one that appears around Kibellah, but... stronger. He is not a psyker, or else, he is such a powerful one that he can conceal his gift. However, his psychic potential is definitely higher than that of an average mortal. There are people like that in the Imperium — undiscovered by Inquisitorial hunters, they live out their lives as individuals with a reputation for having "strange things" happen to them on occasion. Perhaps this decrepit old man is indeed capable of gleaning something more from the Emperor's Tarot than just painted pictures.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sientes una perturbación en torno al Visir. Es similar a la que rodea a Kibellah, pero... más fuerte. No es psíquico, o, si lo es, es tan poderoso como para ocultar su don. Sin embargo, su potencial psíquico supera al de un mortal medio. Hay gente así en el Imperium. La Inquisición no descubre a todos, y algunos viven con la reputación de vivir «cosas raras» en ocasiones. Tal vez este viejo decrépito sea capaz de ver algo más que simples dibujos en el Tarot del Emperador.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたはヴィジールの周辺に奇妙な揺らぎを{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}感じる{/d}。それはキベラの周囲に現れるものと類似しているが…さらに強い。彼は異能者ではない。そうでなければ、自身の能力を隠せるほどに強力な異能者ということになる。とはいえ、超能力の潜在能力は普通の人間より確実に高い。帝国にはこういう人間は存在している。異端審問官ハンターに発見されず、時々『奇妙なこと』が起きると評判の個人として生活を送っている。おそらくこの老人は、皇帝陛下の占い札から描かれた絵以上の何かを読み取ることができるのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}sense{/d} a strange disturbance around the Vizsier. It is similar to the one that appears around Kibellah, but... stronger. He is not a psyker, or else, he is such a powerful one that he can conceal his gift. However, his psychic potential is definitely higher than that of an average mortal. There are people like that in the Imperium — undiscovered by Inquisitorial hunters, they live out their lives as individuals with a reputation for having "strange things" happen to them on occasion. Perhaps this decrepit old man is indeed capable of gleaning something more from the Emperor's Tarot than just painted pictures.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたはヴィジールの周辺に奇妙な揺らぎを感じる。それはキベラの周囲に現れるものと類似しているが…さらに強い。彼は異能者ではない。そうでなければ、自身の能力を隠せるほどに強力な異能者ということになる。とはいえ、超能力の潜在能力は普通の人間より確実に高い。帝国にはこういう人間は存在している。異端審問官ハンターに発見されず、時々『奇妙なこと』が起きると評判の個人として生活を送っている。おそらくこの老人は、皇帝陛下の占い札から描かれた絵以上の何かを読み取ることができるのだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}感觉{/d}到宿老身边存在着某种古怪的扰动。这种扰动与绮贝菈身边的扰动非常类似，但却……更加强大。宿老并不是灵能者，当然，他也有可能是位极其强大的灵能者，知道如何隐藏他的力量。无论是哪种情况，他的灵能潜质绝对强于普通的凡人。帝国里确实会有这样的人，这些人没有被审判庭的猎人发现，而这些人往往赫赫有名，因为他们身边时常会发生某些“古怪的事情”。或许在这位年老体衰的老人眼中，帝皇的塔罗牌上画着的并不仅仅是单纯的图案。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}sense{/d} a strange disturbance around the Vizsier. It is similar to the one that appears around Kibellah, but... stronger. He is not a psyker, or else, he is such a powerful one that he can conceal his gift. However, his psychic potential is definitely higher than that of an average mortal. There are people like that in the Imperium — undiscovered by Inquisitorial hunters, they live out their lives as individuals with a reputation for having "strange things" happen to them on occasion. Perhaps this decrepit old man is indeed capable of gleaning something more from the Emperor's Tarot than just painted pictures.{/n}

{n}你感觉到宿老身边存在着某种古怪的扰动。这种扰动与绮贝菈身边的扰动非常类似，但却……更加强大。宿老并不是灵能者，当然，他也有可能是位极其强大的灵能者，知道如何隐藏他的力量。无论是哪种情况，他的灵能潜质绝对强于普通的凡人。帝国里确实会有这样的人，这些人没有被审判庭的猎人发现，而这些人往往赫赫有名，因为他们身边时常会发生某些“古怪的事情”。或许在这位年老体衰的老人眼中，帝皇的塔罗牌上画着的并不仅仅是单纯的图案。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vezir'in etrafını saran, tuhaf bir huzursuzluk {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}hissediyorsun{/d}. Kibellah'nın etrafında görünene benzer ama... Daha güçlü bir his bu. Vezir, ya bir ruhsezer değil ya da öyle güçlü bir ruhsezer ki yetilerini saklayabiliyor. Ancak ruhsezi potansiyelinin ortalama bir fâniden çok daha yüksek olduğu aşikâr. İmparatorluk'ta onun gibi niceleri mevcut. Bu insanlar, Engizisyon avcıları tarafından keşfedilmeden birey olarak ömürlerini tüketir ve arada sırada başlarına "tuhaf şeyler" gelmesiyle nam salar. Belki de bu dermansız ihtiyar, İmparator'un Tarotu'ndan sırf resimden ziyade hakikaten de çok daha fazlasını çıkarabilecek yetide birisidir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}sense{/d} a strange disturbance around the Vizsier. It is similar to the one that appears around Kibellah, but... stronger. He is not a psyker, or else, he is such a powerful one that he can conceal his gift. However, his psychic potential is definitely higher than that of an average mortal. There are people like that in the Imperium — undiscovered by Inquisitorial hunters, they live out their lives as individuals with a reputation for having "strange things" happen to them on occasion. Perhaps this decrepit old man is indeed capable of gleaning something more from the Emperor's Tarot than just painted pictures.{/n}
